content.rendered:
Directed by Kabir Khan.

Written by Kabir Khan. Parveez Sheikh. Kabir Khan. Kausar Munir.

Cast Saif Ali Khan(Daniyal Khan). Katrina Kaif(Nawaz Mistry). Sabyasachi Chakrabarty(R.A.W. Chief Roy). Rajesh Tailang(Raw Agent Alok). Sohaila Kapur(Ameena Bi (as Sohaila Kapoor)). Midhat Khan(Khalid Hussain). Sumit Gulati(Shahzad). Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub(Samit mishra (as Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub)). Denzil Smith(Haider). Mir Sarwar(Sajid Meed). Ashwath Bhatt(Feroz). Sandeep Bose(Policeman Interrogated Shahzaad). Pawan Chopra(ISI Agent). Kaizaad Kotwal(Pakistani Minister). Chittaranjan Tripathy(Prisoner) . Hervey Afiune(Otto Bexley). Elyas Ahmad(TBA). Farah Ahmed(Commuter / Cricket Spectator). Brandi Alexander(Court Clerk). Mohammed Ali(Cricket Spectator). Manoj Anand(Cricket Spectator). Jane Clark Anderson(Cricket Spectator). Darren Andrichuk(Policeman). Claire Ashton(Mother in Danger). Nicole Atalla(Little Kid).Ravi Aujla. Habib Azmi(Old Chaiwala at Taj). Hayley Joanne Bacon(Spectator at Cricket Match). Joy Badlani(Sanjay Patil). Ella Banks(Commuter). Helen Banks(Cricket Spectator). Richard Banks(Commuter). 

Language Hindi.

Producers Hervey Afiune. Rajan Kapoor. Siddharth Roy Kapur. Rakesh Madhotra. Raymond Massey. Sajid Nadiadwala. Cyrus Patel. Aditya Singh. Prakash Upadhyay.

Production FilmWorks. Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment. UTV Motion Pictures.
